thread.section_title: Kampala Serena Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Dinner with my husband
thread.title_full: Dinner with my husband - Review of Kampala Serena Hotel, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: Barbara G
title: Dinner with my husband
text:
We had dinner last night which was delicious. It was in the from of a buffet and the choice of food was lovely. It ranged from traditional to international. The salads were so fresh and the desserts all very tempting.
We started the evening with a cocktail and were serenaded by a chorus of frogs!
All the staff were very friendly and efficient. Service was faultless.
